::KitKat::

She looked at Megatron and stood there awaiting him to beat the armor 
off her.  She looked Megatron in the eye.  Her fear was slowly 
rising.  
"Commander, I will take whatever you feel is suitable punishment for 
my behavoir.  I have tried to what I felt would be in the best 
interests of the group and bring glory to you, Commander Megatron."

She knealt down on one knee and looked up at Megatron, waiting for 
the blow to be delt.
